name: podlite-web
description: A minimal, lightweight starter for creating static blogs/sites using nexjs and Podlite markup language

scripts.start: yarn process && yarn build && next start
scripts.postinstall: yarn config set --home enableTelemetry 0 && next telemetry disable
scripts.export: yarn process && yarn build && next export -o out
scripts.export-zip: yarn process && yarn build && next export -o site && zip -r - site | cat
scripts.process: yarn clean && mkdir -p built && ts-node -P tsconfig-node.json bin/makeDataSource.ts
scripts.dev: npx nodemon --watch ./examples --watch ./pub -e pod6   --exec 'yarn clean && yarn process && next dev'
